intro_only_event_flying_gathering/4901_1:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve got
something good to tell you.

Flying-type sync pairs are getting together! I’m
sure it’ll make for some great battles!

I’m gonna take part to test my skills, too, so
you better come! I’ll be waiting!
intro_only_event_flying_gathering/6001_1:
I’ll teach you just how
awesome my Pidgeot is as
many times as you want!

Some real-famous Flying-type sync pairs on Pasio
are getting together!

Heh, of course, I’m strongest out of all
of them, though!
